id: Erection of a two-storey side extension.

addr: Driving Test Centre Green Lane Southampton SO16 9FP

id: TG3 Robinia group - Clear undergrowth around trees. Reinspect. TG4 Mixed species group: Cypress, Bay, Yew, Laurel - Remove major dead wood over site. Trim up to 2m to tidy. TG5 Cypress Group - Remove major dead wood. Cut back branches from lamp column to give clearance of 1-2m. TG7 Mixed species group; Cypress, Holm Oak and Holly - Crown lift and annually trim to 4m. Clear vegetation around trees. TG10 Mixed species group - Cut back to suitable side growth point to provide 2-3m clearance from adjacent building. Remove major dead wood. Clear vegetation. Reinspect. TG12 Mixed species group; Holm Oak, Birch, Sycamore - Annual trimming maintenance up to 2m TG13 Mixed species group - Trim cut back up to 2m to bring back under annual management. Fell dead dying stems. TG14 Mixed species group; Yew, Holm Oak, Birch, Sycamore - Trim / cut back up to 2m to tidy annually. Clear dumped vegetative debris. TG15 Mixed species group; Hornbeam Yew - Trim annually TG16 Laurel and Rhododendron Hedge - Annual trimming maintenance TG17 Mixed species group; Yew, Thuja - Trim annually TG19 Mixed Conifer Group; Lawson Cypress, Golden Cypress - Remove major dead wood. Sever Ivy at ground level and strip to 2m and remove section. Re-inspect TG20 Mixed species group; Laurel, Ash, Sycamore - Fell declining Ash and seedling Sycamore.
addr: Boldrewood Campus University of Southampton Burgess Road Southampton SO16 7QF
